title.narrative: Support to the Council of Europe

description.narrative:
The contribution of DKK 750.000 to the Court’s Special Account shall finance an A-grade lawyer working on Ukraine specific cases with a view to bringing down the backlog.
Objective: The wider objective to be achieved is to increase its contribution to the respect of human rights and the rule of law in Ukraine, through a higher number of cases decided by the Court. Outcome: Reducing the backlog of the Court and consolidating rule of law and democracy in Ukraine.
Due to its nature as a response to a humanitarian appeal operational results are general and highly aggregated and the MFA contribution is thus reflected in the overall results reporting by the partner. Please refer to the hyperlink below.
https://www.hqai.org/en/resources/

The wider objective to be achieved is to increase its contribution to the respect of human rights and the rule of law in Ukraine, through a higher number of cases decided by the Court. Outcome: Reducing the backlog of the Court and consolidating rule of law and democracy in Ukraine.
